title: The Future of Destiny | Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.09.20
description:
Imran and Fran talk about the next few years of Destiny and Bungie, next-gen reveal plans between Microsoft and Sony, and discuss rumors about new Far Cry and Okami games.
 
Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:01:40 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Showcase is back, but it’s called the Guerilla Collective! We’ve teamed up with our friends at the Media Indie Exchange to do a three-day showcase featuring nearly 90 games! It all kicks off Saturday at 10 am PT on twitch!
We’re Live reacting to the PS5 event Thursday @ 1 pm on Twitch! TLOU2 Review is Friday at 12:01 am pt! Core Game Jam is Friday after KFGD!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:03:00 - A DESTINY THING HAPPENED
00:18:45 - Xbox Event Moved? Not so, says Greenberg.
00:29:38 - Neil Druckmann Undecided on Whether His Next Game Will Be The Last of Us 3 or New IP (Joe Skrebels at IGN)
00:33:50 - The Last of Us Podcast Series Launched by PlayStation (Matt Purslow at IGN)
00:35:30 - Nintendo says additional 140,000 accounts compromised in data breach (Dexter Tan Guan Hao at Dot Esports)
00:37:30 - A BUNCHA GAME RUMORS
00:45:50 - Out today
00:48:00 - Reader mail   -
00:50:40 - With everything that has happened in the last 2 weeks we have gotten a lot of information and promises of change from major developers when it comes to online multiplayer. HOWEVER, when can we actually expect these new promises to be rolled out? - Frankfurtter
00:53:15 - Squad Up:Ryan Grant(Xbox One) - Colonel Spunky
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary
